# Issue Triage Agent

**Purpose:** This agent automatically categorizes and routes new issues to the appropriate team members.

**Trigger:** This agent is triggered when a new issue is created in the repository.

**Actions:**

1.  Analyzes the issue title and body to determine its category (e.g., bug, feature request, documentation).
2.  Assigns the appropriate labels to the issue.
3.  Assigns the issue to the appropriate team member or team.
4.  Posts a comment on the issue to confirm that it has been triaged.
